About

This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basicc Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com.

You can find the source fode for the Jekyll new theme at: github.com/jglovier/jekyll-new.

You can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll.
